content: It is completely normal for babies to cry. You are doing a great job.

title: Check Physical Needs
content: Is the baby hungry, tired, or in need of a diaper change?
Take care of their needs. You're doing the right thing.

title: Comfort Techniques
content: Try swaddling, rocking, or white noise.

title: When to get help
content: If the baby has a fever over 100.4°F (38°C) or seems in pain, call your pediatrician.
